properties.query: SELECT c.course_id, c.title, c.instructor_id, c.category_id, c.total_time, c.total_lecture_count, c.content, c.content_detail, c.created_at, c.updated_at FROM course AS c WHERE c.course_id = ?
SELECT t.tag_id, t.name, t.created_at FROM course AS c JOIN course_tag AS ct ON c.course_id = ct.course_id JOIN Tag AS t ON t.tag_id = ct.tag_id WHERE c.course_id = ? ORDER BY t.tag_id
